measure.name: modify_xml
measure.description: Modify the contents of an existing, valid XML file
measure.modeler_description: The measure changes values of requested XML fields

argument.name: xml_file_path
argument.description: Path to existing XML file to modify

argument.name: save_file_path
argument.description: Path to save new xml file

argument.name: heating_setpoint_offset
argument.description: Degrees to change heating setpoint. Positive increases, negative decreases.

argument.name: cooling_setpoint_offset
argument.description: Degrees to change cooling setpoint. Positive increases, negative decreases.

argument.name: air_leakage_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on the air leakage rate. Value > 1 increases air leakage, < 1 decreases. Examples: 0.1 = 10x reduction, 10 = 10x increase.

argument.name: heating_efficiency_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on heating equipment efficiency. Value > 1 increases efficiency, < 1 decreases. Examples: 0.1 = 10x reduction, 10 = 10x increase.

argument.name: cooling_efficiency_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on cooling equipment efficiency. Value > 1 increases efficiency, < 1 decreases. Examples: 0.1 = 10x reduction, 10 = 10x increase.

argument.name: misc_load_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on miscellaneous load usage. Value > 1 increases load, < 1 decreases. Examples: 0.1 = 10x reduction, 10 = 10x increase.

argument.name: roof_r_value_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on roof R-value. Value > 1 increases R-value, < 1 decreases. Examples: 0.1 = 10x reduction, 10 = 10x increase.

argument.name: ceiling_r_value_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on ceiling (attic floor) R-value. Value > 1 increases R-value, < 1 decreases. Examples: 0.1 = 10x reduction, 10 = 10x increase.

argument.name: floor_r_value_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on floor R-value. Value > 1 increases R-value, < 1 decreases. Examples: 0.1 = 10x reduction, 10 = 10x increase.

argument.name: above_ground_walls_r_value_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on above-ground wall R-value. Value > 1 increases R-value, < 1 decreases. Examples: 0.1 = 10x reduction, 10 = 10x increase.

argument.name: below_ground_walls_r_value_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on below-ground wall R-value. Value > 1 increases R-value, < 1 decreases. Examples: 0.1 = 10x reduction, 10 = 10x increase.

argument.name: slab_r_value_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on foundation slab R-value. Value > 1 increases R-value, < 1 decreases. Examples: 0.1 = 10x reduction, 10 = 10x increase.

argument.name: water_heater_efficiency_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on water heater efficiency (EF/UEF). Value > 1 increases efficiency, < 1 decreases. Examples: 0.1 = 10x reduction, 10 = 10x increase.

argument.name: water_fixtures_usage_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on water fixtures usage. Value > 1 increases usage, < 1 decreases. Examples: 0.1 = 10x reduction, 10 = 10x increase.

argument.name: lighting_load_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on lighting load. Value > 1 increases load, < 1 decreases. Examples: 0.1 = 10x reduction, 10 = 10x increase.

argument.name: window_u_factor_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on window U-factor. Value > 1 increases U-factor, < 1 decreases. Examples: 0.1 = 10x reduction, 10 = 10x increase.

argument.name: window_shgc_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on window SHGC. Value > 1 increases SHGC, < 1 decreases. Examples: 0.1 = 10x reduction, 10 = 10x increase.

argument.name: appliance_usage_multiplier
argument.description: Multiplier on usage_multiplier of all appliances. Value > 1 increases usage, < 1 decreases. Examples: 0.1 = 10x reduction, 10 = 10x increase.
